data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 1, Tosu push upfield but Ryuji Sato quickly pulls them for offside.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Tosu.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
Renzo Lopez's header is off-target for Tosu.
In the minute 5, Ryuji Sato awards Gamba a goal kick.
Ryuji Sato awards the away team a throw-in.
Tosu to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
In the minute 8, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
Gamba drive forward but Patric is judged offside.
Goal kick for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 11, Goal! Ryunosuke Sagara gives Tosu a 0-1 lead in Suita.
Throw-in for Gamba close to the penalty box.
Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, Gamba have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
Gamba's Yuya Fukuda breaks free at Panasonic Stadium Suita. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 16, Tosu have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Tosu.
Fuchi Honda of Tosu gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 22, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Ryuji Sato signals a Gamba throw-in in Tosu's half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Tosu at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Throw-in Tosu.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Gamba.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Gamba in the half of Tosu.
Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
Hiroki Fujiharu (Gamba) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Gamba's Takashi Usami is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Gamba.
Gamba surge into the attack at Panasonic Stadium Suita but Patricâ€™s header is off-target.
Ryuji Sato awards Tosu a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Tosu at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Free kick Tosu.
Tosu are caught offside.
In the minute 43, Gamba have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Shunya Suganuma (Gamba) gets in a header but the ball hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Suita.
Shu Kurata (Gamba) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
In the minute 45, Patric (Gamba) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Tosu at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Free kick for Tosu in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
The second-half has started.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ryoya Morishita is on a sub for Yuto Uchida for Tosu.
In the minute 46, Myung Hwi Kim (Tosu) is making a second substitution, with Tomoya Koyamatsu replacing Ryunosuke Sagara.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
In the minute 49, Throw-in Gamba.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Gamba.
Eduardo is booked for the away team.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In the minute 55, Gamba are coming forward and Yuya Fukuda gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Tosu have a goal kick.
Free kick Gamba.
In the minute 56, Yuki Yamamoto is replacing Yuya Fukuda for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
In Suita Gamba attack through Shinya Yajima. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
In the minute 62, Patric (Gamba) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In Suita, Shinya Yajima of Gamba is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 63, Ryuji Sato signals a throw-in for Gamba, close to Tosu's area.
Tosu needs to be cautious. Gamba have an attacking throw-in.
Ryuji Sato awards Tosu a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Patric (Gamba) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Tosu defenders.
Free kick Gamba.
In the minute 69, Gamba have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Gamba pushes forward through Shinya Yajima, whose finish on goal is saved.
The home team replace Shuhei Kawasaki with Kazuma Watanabe.
Tosu advance rapidly upfield but Ryuji Sato blows for offside.
In the minute 72, Myung Hwi Kim is making the team's third substitution at Panasonic Stadium Suita with Daichi Hayashi replacing Renzo Lopez.
Hideto Takahashi is replacing Yuta Higuchi for Tosu at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gamba have a goal kick.
Daichi Hayashi of Tosu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 76, In Suita, Tosu push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Patric.
Ryu Takao instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 79, Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Shu Kurata for Gamba has been booked by Ryuji Sato and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 80, Daichi Hayashi for Tosu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Gamba make their third substitution with Shoji Toyama replacing Takashi Usami.
In the minute 80, The home team replace Shu Kurata with Dai Tsukamoto.
Can Tosu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
In the minute 81, Daichi Hayashi for the away team is judged to be offside.
The away team have replaced Fuchi Honda with Yohei Toyoda. This is the fifth substitution made today by Myung Hwi Kim.
Tosu's Daichi Hayashi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gamba defender.
Tosu drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Tosu's Ryoya Morishita misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Suita.
In the minute 85, Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Panasonic Stadium Suita, Tosu are penalized for being offside.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In the minute 87, Gamba push upfield and Patric gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Tosu defence.
Gamba have a dangerous throw-in.
Ryuji Sato signals a Gamba throw-in in Tosu's half.
In the minute 89, Gamba have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Gamba drives forward and Shoji Toyama gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
Ryuji Sato will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Gamba in Suita.
Throw-in for Tosu in the half of Gamba.
Ryuji Sato awards the home team a throw-in.
Shoji Toyama (Gamba) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Suita, Tosu push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Riki Harakawa (Tosu) gets a yellow card.
